item.description:
[b]Rehearsal for 20th Art MUSIC Games Party.[/b] This is the Social Fun multi meetup event that is also an event of this meetup and 7 or more other meetups.  Looking for soloists and to put small bands together.   Rehearsal of songs for performance.  possible open mic hour.  This rehearsal today goes until 6pm or later if necessary.  Sign up to get directions & phone # for questions.

Generally, newcomers, intermediates and free style jamming starts at 2PM, and Rehearsal for Open mikes, shows around 3:00. Bring music sheets of your songs if possible. All musician levels welcome & encouraged. Lessons in theory or practice, music genres, or jamming if appropriate. [i]Directions will be emailed to attendees the night before or morning (by 10AM) of the meetup[/i]. If a lot of people RSVP we will extend time, so you can come late to stagger arrivals so each gets a chance to play your songs.
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be sent out to attendees the day before the meetup.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Rehearsal for 20th Art MUSIC Games Party
